description: Pipeline B (LLM) - 300 gold standard jobs - Pre-ESCO - Exp3 (mcs=15)
sql_query: SELECT normalized_skill as skill_text, COUNT(*) as frequency, COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) as job_count FROM enhanced_skills WHERE job_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT job_id FROM gold_standard_annotations) AND skill_type = 'hard' GROUP BY normalized_skill ORDER BY frequency DESC
temporal_sql_query: SELECT normalized_skill as skill_text, DATE_TRUNC('quarter', rj.posted_date) as quarter, COUNT(*) as frequency FROM enhanced_skills es JOIN raw_jobs rj ON es.job_id = rj.job_id WHERE es.job_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT job_id FROM gold_standard_annotations) AND es.skill_type = 'hard' GROUP BY normalized_skill, quarter
